text: Blue-Zoo Productions is a UK-based computer animation studio. Blue-Zoo is mainly known for producing children's TV series, advertising commercials and short films. Some of the more popular children's shows the studio has produced are Miffy and Friends, Alphablocks, Digby Dragon and Miffy's Adventures Big and Small. The company operates from a studio in Fitzrovia, London, where they have a team of over 100 artists. It later opened up a new studio, adjacent to its main studio, specializing in 2D animation. == List of productions == * The Story Makers (2002-04) * Miffy and Friends (2003-07) * Alphablocks (2010-) * Olive the Ostrich (2011) * Tree Fu Tom (2012-16) * Q Pootle 5 (2013-14) * Goldie and Bear (2015-20) * Miffyâ€™s Adventures Big and Small (2015-) * Digby Dragon (2016) * Numberblocks (2017-) * T.O.T.S.
